// src/store.js
import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{combineReducers}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import departmentReducer from"./features/departmentSlice";import employeeReducer from"./features/employeeSlice";const rootReducer=combineReducers({department:departmentReducer,employees:employeeReducer});const store=configureStore({reducer:rootReducer});export default store;
